This call is to a method from API 17, the call containing class androidx.browser.browseractions.BrowserActionsIntent is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 17. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(17) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(17).
